author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

In preparation of the update of ```RecoMTD/DetLayers``` needed by the addition of the new two-layers ETL design, this PR refreshes the verbosity of the package (for a more flexible management during debugging) and update its test part.

As a side note, also the verbosity of the ```TrackingTools/DetLayers``` base classes could be refreshed in case.

#### PR validation:

The test runs smoothly, with no change in its output on D50 compared to the previous state of the code.
title: MTD reco geometry: revision of DetLayers verbosity and test
